# LynxPrompt

> Your universal AI config hub

LynxPrompt is a web platform and CLI for generating and sharing AI IDE configuration files (AGENTS.md, .cursor/rules/, CLAUDE.md, etc.) and commands (slash commands/workflows). Instead of manually writing configs for every project, use our wizard or browse community blueprints.

## What LynxPrompt Does

- **AI Configs**: Rules and instructions that define how AI assistants behave in your project
- **Commands**: Slash commands that execute specific workflows on demand (e.g., /security-audit)
- **Blueprints**: Shareable, versioned config templates with [[VARIABLE]] placeholders

## Supported Platforms

30+ AI coding assistants including: Cursor, Claude Code, GitHub Copilot, Windsurf, Zed, Aider, Antigravity (Gemini), Cline, Roo Code, Continue.dev, Amazon Q, and more.

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://lynxprompt.com/docs/getting-started): Quick start guide
- [Wizard Docs](https://lynxprompt.com/docs/wizard): Configuration wizard guide
- [Blueprints Docs](https://lynxprompt.com/docs/blueprints): Blueprint marketplace and features
- [CLI Docs](https://lynxprompt.com/docs/cli): Command-line interface reference
- [API Docs](https://lynxprompt.com/docs/api): REST API documentation
- [Platforms](https://lynxprompt.com/docs/platforms): Supported AI IDEs and tools

## Optional

- [Full Documentation](https://lynxprompt.com/llms-full.txt): Complete documentation for LLMs
